dat1
Class LinkedList<E>

java.lang.Object
  dat1.LinkedList<E>

public class LinkedList<E>
extends java.lang.Object

Implementation of a doubly-linked list. A LinkedList consists of a sequence of nodes, containing the list data, that link to one and other.

A LinkedList implements relatively efficient insertion and removal operations. But unlike an indexed structure such as an array, fast, random access to its elements is not possible.

Author:
K. Atas
